summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the acquisition of Lots 1, 2 and 3, Block 1, Cheasty Boulevard Addition to the City of Seattle, according to the plat thereof recorded in Volume 26 of Plats, page 5, in King County, Washington, for open space, park and recreation purposes; authorizing the payment of related costs; and authorizing acceptance of the deed for open space, park and recreation purposes.
